description:
Kodi 21.0 open-source and free home theater/media center software and entertainment hub for digital media is now available with major changes. Here's what's new!

The post Kodi 21.0 “Omega” Open-Source Media Center Is Here with Major Changes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Kodi 21.0 “Omega” Open-Source Media Center Is Here with Major Changes
